DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Of The Potential Effect That The Administration Of Food Or Antacid Medication May Have In The Oral Absorption Of Dacomitinib ( PF-00299804 )
DOC.criteria: Healthy subject include male age 18 55 year . Females non childbearing potential . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 ; total body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) . An informed consent document sign date subject . Any condition possibly affect drug absorption ( eg , gastrectomy ) . A positive urine drug screen . Treatment investigational drug within 30 day ( determined local requirement ) appropriate time base elimination characteristic study medication .
